324388.<color_yellow>\n仲間から 受け取ったこころは\nこころの器の 中:
The Hearts that you receive from your companions are stored inside of the Heart Holder.
Hearts are equipment items. By selecting the Heart Holder under "Equip", a list of Hearts you currently possess will be displayed.
Selecting a Heart from this list will allow you to equip it.
If you need another Heart Holder, you can get another one from at the Otherworld Outpost.

329893.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 10>\n「へえ……。これが:
Huh... So with these, I can get stronger? Sounds good to me.
You should let me tag along with you more. There's still stuff I wanna talk with you about. That good with you?

329894.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 10>\n「まあ これは な:
My, what is this? I feel like the experience I've gained so far will guide me even further than before.
I want to keep growing alongside you. Let's continue sharing all kinds of stories with one another. Okay, ?

329895.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 10>\n「でかしたぞ <p:
Nice work, . With these, my power can go even higher than before!
I'll do my best to make you proud. Let's keep on together, Demon Lord! There's still so much more to talk about.

329896.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 10>\n「なんだ これは？:
What is this? ...Well, no matter. Whatever it may be, it seems I can use it to my advantage.
I'll push past my limits and grow even stronger. If you can keep up, then maybe I'll consider a chat with you.

329897.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 10>\n「これは かなり貴:
This looks quite valuable. I can feel the potential within me starting to awaken!
With this, I should be able to keep helping you. There's still so much I want to talk about, so I hope we can continue on together.

329898.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 10>\n「これは 何かしら:
What's this? I feel that my potential is growing...how strange.
I want to become even stronger and for you to know more about me. Is that asking for too much?

329899.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 10>\n「おや……なんです:
Oh? What's that? I'm not sure why, but...I feel like I can become even stronger now!
I hope our explorations together will make us even more close. I'm looking forward to it!

329900.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 10>\n「……なんだ これ:
...What is this? Looking at it, I feel free of my inner shackles, becoming a new me.
Thank you, . I swear to push even higher than before, in both battle and as a friend.

329901.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HAK_M01 10>\n「ほう……これは:
Wow...how wonderful. I can envision a path to something much greater now.
I'm not the best at keeping interesting conversations, but I'll try my best. I hope that you'll have me.

330023.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 12>\n「……なに？ 新し:
...What? You're giving me a new outfit? Hey, now. I hope they're at least decent...
Huh... Not bad. I appreciate that they aren't too gaudy. Thanks. I'll wear 'em.

330024.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 12>\n「これを 私に く:
You're giving this to me? Thank you so much, I will open it right away!
Oh, my...! What a lovely dragon pattern! I've never seen such a chic design before... I promise to treasure it.

330025.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 14>\n「これは……アスバ:
Oh, this...I've heard about this from Asbal. If I remember correctly, the Elves of Astoltia wear this. Young warriors like it, I think?
You can't find this design anywhere in the Demon World, but I'm sure I'll pull off the look just fine. Might as well tie up my hair
too. Thanks!

330028.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 12>\n「私に くれるの…:
You're giving this to me...? What is it? I'm anxious to know. Can I open it?
Hehe... What a cute dress. I'll have a good day for sure if I wear this. Thank you, .

330029.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 14>\n「おや？ 新しい服:
Oh? You're giving me new clothes? I'm pretty picky about fashion, you know. Let's see...
Wow...they're sparkly. I didn't know your sewing skills were this excellent. I'm not sure if they'll suit me, but I'll try.

330040.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HYZ_M01 14>\n「なんだ？ オレに:
Huh? You brought me some clothes? Sometimes mine get worn out quickly from fighting, so I'm glad you did.
Oh? You went out of your way to pick a different color than what I wear normally. You've got a good eye!

330041.<voice_nw IEV_AST_EST_M01 14>\n「これを 私に く:
Is this for me? Thank you so much. I'll open it right away.
Oh, my...! It's the same as the clothes I usually wear, but the color difference makes it seem new! How nice of you.

330042.<voice_nw IEV_AST_YSK_M01 12>\n「ほう 衣装の着替:
Oh, so you're giving me new clothes? And it's a different color, chosen with your style sense. I like it. I'll gladly accept.
This fur is perfect for those cold desert nights. Although, during the day, the heat just makes me want to tear it off!

330043.<voice_nw IEV_AST_VAR_M01 12>\n「なんだ これは？:
What are these? New clothes...? I'll take them for now. Though if I don't like them, I'm just going to get rid of them.
Hmm...so you chose the same design on purpose, did you? The colors aren't bad. I'll wear them if that's what you want.

330044.<voice_nw IEV_AST_ASB_M01 12>\n「ゼクレス魔導国の:
The Demon Kings of Zechres pass down the same outfit design by tradition, and express their individuality in the color they choose.
Wearing this, I feel like I could experience being an entirely different person. Heh heh... I suppose it's not so bad.

330045.<voice_nw IEV_AST_IRS_M01 14>\n「私に くれるの…:
You're giving this to me...? What is it? I'm anxious to know. Can I open it?
Huh? It's the same as the dress I have. But I've never seen it in this color... Clothes are like paintings... Endless possibilities.

330046.<voice_nw IEV_AST_SIN_M01 12>\n「おや？ 新しい服:
Oh? You're giving me new clothes? I'm pretty picky about fashion, you know. Let's see...
Wow...it's a different color from what I usually wear! Dyeing always interested me, and I really like this color scheme. It's great!

330047.<voice_nw IEV_AST_RAD_M01 12>\n「いつも すまんな:
I apologize, as always... I appreciate your thoughtfulness. I see... It's my clothesーjust a different color.
But these seem better tailored. They also carry your heartfelt intentions, after all. I'll be sure to wear and cherish them.

330048.<voice_nw IEV_AST_HAK_M01 12>\n「これを 私に く:
You're giving this to me? Thank you. Oh...they're my clothes in a different color.
My clothes come from the time of the Yamakaminu days, so it must've been difficult to find the same style. I am grateful.

My beloved... My dearest... Please accept this from me.

339916.「異界アスタルジアの創造主だよ。\n 魔眼の月に封印されていた 禍々しい思念が\:
It's the creator of Astalgia. When the Eye of Evil crashed down, its sinister remnants that were sealed inside of it gave rise to
this place.
Godwyn gathered his strength here and has finally revived himself...but it looks like he's not able to leave just yet.
But if he were to revive with all of his power intact... Astoltia would be in serious danger!
He's likely gathering even more power as we speak...
If he shows up again, we gotta defeat himー for Astoltia's sake!
